goal.en:
"The purpose of this course is to bring to the advanced students the basic and the latest developments in industrial organization in a very precise manner. The contents of the course includes:
1. Basic Concepts in Game Theory.
2. Markets for Homogeneous Products.
3. Markets for Differentiated Products.
4. Concentration, Merges, and Entry Barriers.
5. Research and Development.
6. The Economics of Compatibility and Standards.
7. Advertising.
8. Quality, Durability and Warranties.
9. Two-Part Tariff and Peak-Load Pricing.
10. Bundling, Upgrading, and Dealerships.
11. Selected Industries."
